items.name: Rathpith Globe
explicitMods: 14% Chance to Block Spell Damage
143% increased Energy Shield
10% increased maximum Life
Sacrifice 10% of your Life when you Use or Trigger a Spell Skill
5% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells per 100 Player Maximum Life
5% increased Spell Damage per 100 Player Maximum Life
flavourText: The Vaal emptied their slaves of beating hearts,
and left a mountain of twitching dead.

items.name: Kaom's Heart
explicitMods: Has no Sockets
23% increased Fire Damage
+500 to maximum Life

items.name: Profane Proxy
explicitMods: +3 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
+28% to Cold Resistance
+29% to Lightning Resistance
Left Ring Slot: Your Chilling Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
Right Ring Slot: Your Shocking Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
flavourText: The machines do not hate. They merely serve one who does.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their fire resistance and giving them a chance to be ignited when hit.
explicitMods: Base duration is 11.80 seconds
+1 metre to radius
Cursed enemies have -36% to Fire Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Ignite
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Cataclysm Call
explicitMods: 38% increased Spell Damage
85% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
+26 to maximum Energy Shield
+31 to maximum Life
+44% to Fire Resistance

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: +1.8 metres to radius
You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby allies have 38% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 15% more Spell Damage
